sentences.sentence: He is expected to hold talks with both the Croatian and Slovenian leaderships.
sentences.translation: 人们希望他能与克罗地亚和斯洛文尼亚两国的领导人举行会谈。

sentences.sentence: May deliver old person, delivers the leaderships, delivers friend and so on!
